Articles.Content:
For a while now I've been having an issue with bluescreens, so I started taking pictures of them all and I've compiled them into a sort of bluescreen collage... Here it is, if you can help, please do!

https://imgur.com/a/Gjvsd

Phew, that are many bluescreens bro, are you sure you have the latest drivers for everything? If not, don't update them via devicemanager, but directly from the website of the manufacturer.

Good luck

well a couple of them are complaining about the ATI Drivers (that is if you have one , otherwise they shouldnt be there)

first thing can be to try and reinstall those

some of them complain about directx files aswell so try updating/reinstalling those aswell

ATI drivers : http://support.amd.com/en-us/download

directx : http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35
Thank you, I'll try that out as soon as possible. (That is, if I don't find a way to strangle my laptop first)
